name: Fram Design System Borealis - Free
description:
Welcome to the first iteration of Figma’s most creative design system! 


Here’s what's in store for you: 

  • 4000+ UI Components
  • 1000+ Royalty-Free Original Icons
  • Customizable to your brand or business 
  • Mobile and Desktop sizes for components 
  • Dynamic and set width buttons 
  • Desktop, Tablet, and Mobile Grids
  • Base 8 Sized for Pixel Perfect App Designs


Inside out package you will find a highly functioning design system with the following components: 

  • Colors,
  • Typography, 
  • Shadows and Blurs
  • Icons 
  • Grids and Layout 
  • Avatars 
  • Badges 
  • Breadcrumbs 
  • Buttons and links 
  • Checkboxes and radio buttons 
  • Dropdowns 
  • Inputs 
  • Loading indicators 
  • Pagination 
  • Progress indicators 
  • Ratings 
  • Sliders 
  • Tabs 
  • Toggles 
  • Tooltips 


Fram DS follows the rules of atomic design and offers infinite combinations of components. 


Our next release will give you even more fancy new components to use in your designs!
